name: Titan: The fall of the robot legion
name_original: Titan: The fall of the robot legion
description:
Titan: Fall of the robot legion is a fast-paced fps shooter where your goal is to destroy all the rouge robots at a mining base at Saturnus moon Titan. Fight your way through 20 challenging levels of extreme action while trying to get the highest score possible.

This has been a summer project by four students studying game development at Lulea University of Technology.

  • Simon Öhlund
  • Magnus Lind
  • Felix Gutring
  • Morgan Nyman

Some sounds were made by these chaps:

https://freesound.org/people/subtletransmissions/

https://freesound.org/people/sandyrb/

The sounds were used with this license https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
